meanings.definition: A person who writes computer programs.
meanings.sent1: The programers at the company are working on a new software project.
meanings.sent2: I want to become one of the best programers in the tech industry.
meanings.sent3: The programers decided to have a coding competition for fun.
meanings.sent4: In the world of technology, programers are the architects of the digital realm.
meanings.sent5: The group of programers collaborated to create a groundbreaking app.

meanings.definition: A set of coded instructions that tell a computer how to perform a specific task.
meanings.sent1: The programers for the game designed intricate levels for players to enjoy.
meanings.sent2: Every software application is made up of different programers for various functions.
meanings.sent3: The programers in the code seemed to have a secret message hidden within.
meanings.sent4: The programers whispered to the computer, guiding it through the complex algorithm.
meanings.sent5: The programers meticulously crafted each line of code to ensure flawless execution.
